author: pburba
msg: On the inheritable-props branch: Partially revert r1378317 and fix some bugs
that revision exposed.
* subversion/libsvn_client/iprops.c
(need_to_cache_iprops): It's back, was deleted in r1378317, but it still
serves a purpose.
(svn_client__get_inheritable_props): Return to using need_to_cache_iprops,
but instead of checking *all* the nodes returned by
svn_wc__get_cached_iprop_children as we did pre-r1378317, now we only
check the target itself.  A fuller explanation in the code.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-queries.sql
(STMT_SELECT_INODES): Holy smokes!  This query was unchanged from before
the move of the iprop cache to the NODES table.  It needs to return *only*
nodes that have iprops (which it does now).  This is what caused a slew
of failures post-r1378317, the excessive use of need_to_cache_iprops prior
to that was masking the fact that this query was unconditionally returning
nodes regardless of their iprop cache.

author: cmpilato
msg: Correct some error message details in ra_serf.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c
(fetch_file, end_report): Fix some error messages/code.  They referred to
an "OPTIONS response" when, in fact, the relevant request type was
either a REPORT or a PROPFIND.
